channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Mart√≠nez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump says U.S. is poised for economic boom despite voter sentiment
item.description: In a primetime address Wednesday, President Trump said the nation is on the brink of an economic boom and claimed prices are falling quickly, even as affordability remains a top concern for voters.
item.content:encoded: In a primetime address Wednesday, President Trump said the nation is on the brink of an economic boom and claimed prices are falling quickly, even as affordability remains a top concern for voters.
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Trump tried to ease economic anxieties with his primetime address. Did it work?
item.description: President Trump used a primetime address Wednesday to celebrate his achievements since returning to office. Did his words do enough to ease the economic anxieties being felt by many Americans?
item.content:encoded: President Trump used a primetime address Wednesday to celebrate his achievements since returning to office. Did his words do enough to ease the economic anxieties being felt by many Americans?
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Trump defends his economic record in primetime address, GOP congressmen join Democrats to force ACA subsidy extension vote, Trump orders ban on sanctioned oil tankers traveling to and from Venezuela
item.content:encoded: Trump defends his economic record in primetime address, GOP congressmen join Democrats to force ACA subsidy extension vote, Trump orders ban on sanctioned oil tankers traveling to and from Venezuela
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Ho, Ho, Nope: The Christmas songs that make us cringe
item.description: What are the most unbearable Christmas songs? We offer a few of the many, many options.
item.content:encoded: What are the most unbearable Christmas songs? We offer a few of the many, many options.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Thompson

item.title: Trump administration approves $10B arms sale to Taiwan
item.description: The U.S. will sell Taiwan $10 billion in weapons, including missiles, howitzers and drones, a move expected to escalate tensions with China.
item.content:encoded: The U.S. will sell Taiwan $10 billion in weapons, including missiles, howitzers and drones, a move expected to escalate tensions with China.
item.dc:creator: Anthony Kuhn

item.title: EU leaders meet to decide on use of frozen Russian assets to fund Ukraine's war
item.description: European Union leaders will meet in Brussels on Thursday to decide whether to use frozen Russian assets to help finance Ukraine's war effort.
item.content:encoded: European Union leaders will meet in Brussels on Thursday to decide whether to use frozen Russian assets to help finance Ukraine's war effort.
item.dc:creator: Teri Schultz

item.title: Shrimpers hoped tariffs would provide a lifeline. They're still waiting for relief
item.description: Shrimpers along the South Carolina coast are still waiting for a positive impact from President Trump's tariffs on imported shrimp that are meant to help them compete.
item.content:encoded: Shrimpers along the South Carolina coast are still waiting for a positive impact from President Trump's tariffs on imported shrimp that are meant to help them compete.
item.dc:creator: Victoria Hansen

item.title: Catastrophic flooding forces hundreds of Washington families from their homes
item.description: Hundreds of families across Washington state have been displaced by severe flooding, with some seeking safety in emergency shelters. Recovery may take years as rain continues to fall in the region.
item.content:encoded: Hundreds of families across Washington state have been displaced by severe flooding, with some seeking safety in emergency shelters. Recovery may take years as rain continues to fall in the region.
item.dc:creator: Casey Martin

item.title: ICE is reopening shuttered prisons as detention centers. Many have a troubled past
item.description: In its push for more immigrant detention space, the Trump administration is reopening shuttered prisons in several states. Many of these facilities closed amid allegations of abuse and mismanagement.
item.content:encoded:
In its push for more immigrant detention space, the Trump administration is reopening shuttered prisons in several states. Many of these facilities closed amid allegations of abuse and mismanagement.

(Image credit: Jim West)
item.dc:creator: Meg Anderson

item.title: 4 Republican congressmen join Democrats to force vote on extending ACA subsidies
item.description: Four Republican House members voted with Democrats to force a vote on an extension to the expiring ACA subsidies, as premiums are set to increase significantly for millions of people next month.
item.content:encoded: Four Republican House members voted with Democrats to force a vote on an extension to the expiring ACA subsidies, as premiums are set to increase significantly for millions of people next month.
item.dc:creator: Barbara Sprunt
